availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Elijah J. Coker (Obion Co, TN, engineer & Fulton County, KY)

body.p: Obion County, Tennessee, engineer. Tennessee native. Son of Volentine Coker and Parthenia Coker. Married to Emma J. Chriswell Coker in Gibson County, Tennessee, on September 10, 1856. Father of William T. Coker. Resident of Wilson County, Tennessee, in 1850. Engineer in Obion County in 1860. Signed a petition to Thomas Bramlette in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Wilson County, pp. 480B-481A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Obion County, p. 98.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Gibson County, Rutherford Station, p. 378B.
Tennessee State Marriages, 1780-2002. Marriage Bonds, Loose Records Ar-Fl, 1854 - 1863. Nashville, TN: Tennessee State Library and Archives, p. 426 of microfilm.
KYR-0001-004-0072
